title: (x) The Revolution will be Digitized - Civility Formal {Ignacio, Mike Y}
content: Hey I'm looking for this font. I know it's been altered slightly but hopefully one of you will recognise it. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124640im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33789.jpg)
author: ragpinboy

comments.content: The font is Civility from Alias.
Here's a link to [Veer's showing](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124640/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=ALT0000103), a different one from Ignacio's (you just beat me fella!)
I recognized it 'couse is in [T.26](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124640/http:/www.t26.com/) front page.
